-- Charge costs

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(LCCT_AMOUNTEXCLVAT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(LCCT_AMOUNTVAT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(LCCT_AMOUNTINCLVAT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/LCCT where LCCT_DCHD_NO = :2 for fetch only

Text.val: ... check if at least one row of third table is selected, button "OK" has to be
disabled if not
-- If something is changed in the third tale, disbale button "Daily Statement";
this is necessary because changes are allowed in OCM200A
-- Disbaled OK in the menu, if nothing is seleted (MULT_TAGGED = TRUE)
otherwise enabled OK
-- If something is changed in the third tale, disbale button "Daily Statement";
this is necessary because changes are allowed in OCM200A
... uses for button "Daily statement" -- > Call OCM200A (see parent tasks)
-- If both subscreens called first time then the cursor must positioned on third
table, can't use "End task condition" because the specification screen
needs the LCCT_NO from first row in current table to populate the tabular
view of LCCS rows
